51e007808a9ef3de4860516c252966b883a1ff5d.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to 7... | tools:11

response.content: Good mornin’, Aldric! Thornhaven’s a lively port town, always bustling with merchants, sailors, and a fair share of trouble‑makers. The inn’s the safest spot to drop your gear and hear the latest gossip—just keep your wits about you.

9084e1c5e53d4287ed429853745e6131038ad506.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to 7... | tools:11

response.content: Sure thing, Aldric. If you’re looking for deeper lore, head to the town hall and ask Master Keldric; if it’s a matter of safety, the guard captain at the gate will have the latest patrol reports. Both’ll be keen to hear what a brave traveler like you has to say.
